Name: ActivityDefinitionLevelCS
Title: Level (ActivityDefinition)
Description: Indicates the Level for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: ActivityDefinitionServiceTypeCS
Title: Service Type (ActivityDefinition)
Description: Indicates the Service Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: ActivityDefinitionUsageContextWorkflowTypeCS
Title: Usage Context for Workflow Type (ActivityDefinition)
Description: Indicates the Usage Context for Workflow Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: BillChargeItemCS
Title: ChargeItem (Bill Invoice)
Description: Indicates the ChargeItem for a lineItem from a Bill. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: BillTypeCS
Title: Type (Bill Invoice)
Description: Indicates the Type for Bill. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: ClaimItemCategoryCS
Title: Category of the item (Claim)
Description: Indicates the category for the item under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: ClaimRejectionReasonsCS
Title: Rejection Reasons (Claim)
Description: Indicates the rejection reason of an item from a Claim.  Values limited by openIMIS.

Name: ClaimStatusCS
Title: Status of the claim (Claim|ClaimResponse)
Description: Indicates the status of the Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: ClaimSupportingInfoCategoryCS
Title: Category of the supporting info (Claim)
Description: Indicates the category for the supportiong info under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: ClaimVisitTypeCS
Title: Visit Type (Claim)
Description: Indicates the visit type of the Claim.  Values limited by openIMIS.

Name: ContractPremiumCategoryCS
Title: Premium Category (Contract)
Description: Indicates the category of the premium for the Contract. Cannot be extended.

Name: ContractPremiumPayerCS
Title: Premium Payer (Contract)
Description: Indicates the payer of the premium for the Contract. Can be extended in openIMIS. Need to match openIMIS database payer list.

Name: ContractPremiumTypeCS
Title: Premium Type (Contract)
Description: Indicates the type of the premium for the Contract. Cannot be extended.

Name: ContractResourcePartyRoleCS
Title: Resource Party Role (Contract)
Description: Indicates the participant engagement type for the Contract term.

Name: ContractScopeCS
Title: Scope (Contract)
Description: Indicates the scope for the Contract. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

Name: CoverageItemBenefitTypeCS
Title: Type of benefit (Coverage)
Description: Indicates the type of benefit under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: CoverageItemCategoryCS
Title: Category of the item (Coverage)
Description: Indicates the category for the item under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: DiagnosisICD10Level1CS
Title: ICD 10 Level 1 diagnosis (Claim)
Description: Example of diagnosis to be used with Claim resource. The actual list is configured in openIMIS.

Name: FeedbackPayloadCS
Title: Feedback Payload (CommunicationRequest | Communication)
Description: Indicates the Feedback Payload code for a CommunicationRequest and Communication. List defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: FeedbackStatusCS
Title: Feedback Status (CommunicationRequest)
Description: Indicates the Feedback Status for a CommunicationRequest. Partial list defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: GroupConfirmationTypeCS
Title: Confirmation Types (Group)
Description: Indicates the confirmation type for the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

Name: GroupTypeCS
Title: Group Type (Group)
Description: Indicates the type of the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

Name: InsurancePlanCoverageBenefitLimitCS
Title: Coverage Benefit Limit Types (InsurancePlan)
Description: Indicates the Coverage Benefit Limit Types for an InsurancePlan. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: InsurancePlanGeneralCostTypeCS
Title: General Cost Type (InsurancePlan)
Description: Indicates the General Cost Type for an InsurancePlan. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: InvoiceChargeItemCS
Title: ChargeItem (Invoice)
Description: Indicates the ChargeItem for a lineItem from an Invoice. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: InvoiceTypeCS
Title: Type (Invoice)
Description: Indicates the Type for an Invoice. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: LocationTypeCS
Title: Location Type (Location)
Description: Indicates the location type. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

Name: MedicationItemTypeCS
Title: Item Type (Medication)
Description: Indicates the Medical Item Type for an Medication. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: MedicationLevelCS
Title: Level (Medication)
Description: Indicates the Level for a Medication. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Name: OpenIMISIdentifierCS
Title: openIMIS Identifiers (All)
Description: Identifiers that are specific to openIMIS and could not be found in standard sources.

Name: OrganizationHFCareTypeCS
Title: Health Facility Care Type (Organization)
Description: Indicates the care type of the Health Facility (Organization). Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

Name: OrganizationHFLegalFormCS
Title: Legal Forms (Organization)
Description: Indicates the legal forms of the Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

Name: OrganizationHFLevelCS
Title: Health Facility Level (Organization)
Description: Indicates the level of the Health Facility (Organization). Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

Name: OrganizationPHActivityCS
Title: Activity (Organization)
Description: Indicates the activity of the PolicyHolder Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

Name: OrganizationPHLegalFormCS
Title: Legal Forms (Organization)
Description: Indicates the legal forms of the PolicyHolder Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

Name: PatientContactRelationshipCS
Title: Contact Relationship (Patient)
Description: Indicates the Relationship of a Patient with the Head of the Family. Values defined by openIMIS.

Name: PatientEducationLevelCS
Title: Education Level (Patient)
Description: Indicates the Education level of a Patient. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

Name: PatientProfessionCS
Title: Profession (Patient)
Description: Indicates the profession of a Patient. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

Name: PractitionerQualificationTypeCS
Title: Qualification Type (Practitioner)
Description: Indicates the Qualification Type of a Practitioner.

Name: UsageContextAgeTypeCS
Title: Usage Context for Age Type (ActivityDefinition|Medication)
Description: Indicates the Usage Context for Age Type for an ActivityDefinition or Medication. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

Name: PatientIdentificationTypeCS
Title: Identification Type (Patient)
Description: Indicates the type of document the Patient used to identify himself. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.
